name: addresp
description: Add response with a trigger, and optional channelListen, channelRespond, userListen, and roleListen.

options.name: message_listen
options.description: Listen for trigger in whole message.

options.name: user_listen
options.description: User responder should listen to say the trigger. Defaults to all users.

options.name: role_listen
options.description: Role responder should listen to say the trigger. Defaults to all roles.

options.name: channel_listen
options.description: Channel responder should listen for the trigger in. Defaults to all channels.

options.name: channel_respond
options.description: Channel responder should respond in. Defaults to channel trigger was posted.
